# Icons - LLM Reference

**GENERATED**: 2025-12-11
**SCOPE**: SVG icon assets for UI elements

---

## QUICK_STATS

[TOTAL_FILES]: 25
[FILE_TYPES]: SVG
[URL_PATH]: `/assets/icons/*`

---

## DIRECTORY_INTENT

[PURPOSE]: SVG icon assets for the application
[FORMAT]: SVG files for scalable vector graphics
[USAGE]: Referenced in HTML/CSS via `/assets/icons/` path

---

## USAGE_PATTERN

```html
<img src="/assets/icons/icon-name.svg" alt="Icon description" />
```

```css
background-image: url('/assets/icons/icon-name.svg');
```

---

## COLOR_CONVENTION

[PURPLE_ICONS]: Brand color (#31135d) variants
[NEUTRAL_ICONS]: Default grayscale versions
[PATTERN]: `{name}-purple.svg` for branded versions

---

## NOTES

[OPTIMIZATION]: Icons are optimized SVGs (minimal metadata)
[NAMING]: Descriptive kebab-case file names
[CONSISTENCY]: Matches Feather Icons style used in help center
